div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1849 Swabi, Mardan district, Gandhara, Pakistan, before 1951 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 6+ AR Strato I: 1 dr. Heliocles II: 2 dr. Archebius: 1 tetradr. Diomedes: 2 dr. Disposition: Sotheby, April 30, 1958 (Haughton), nos. 336, 354-55, 357a, 386
